front.title: CoRE Link-Format to DNS-Based Service Discovery Mapping

abstract.t: Resource and service discovery are complimentary. Resource discovery provides fine-grained detail about the content of a server, while service discovery can provide a scable method to locate servers in large networks. This document defines a method for mapping between CoRE Link-Format attributes and DNS-Based Service Discovery fields so the two methods can be jointly employed in large scale networks.
